io.barracks.ota.client

Class UpdateCheckService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • android.app.IntentService
            • io.barracks.ota.client.UpdateCheckService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory

    public class UpdateCheckService
extends android.app.IntentService
implements com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
    This service is used to handle the request to the barracks service in the background.
    It uses the LocalBroadcastManager to send updates about the request, using the categories for an available update, no update available and failure for a defined action
    See Also:
    BarracksHelper

      The default TypeAdapter for the UpdateDetails.

      • getResponsePropertiesAdapter

        protected com.google.gson.TypeAdapter<UpdateDetails> getResponsePropertiesAdapter(com.google.gson.Gson gson,
                                                                                  com.google.gson.reflect.TypeToken<UpdateDetails> type)
        This method provides a TypeAdapter for the UpdateDetails. Override this method to provide a custom implementation, in order to fill the properties bundle with specific values.
        Parameters:
        gson - The Gson parser instance.
        type - The TypeToken for the UpdateDetails
        Returns:
        The TypeAdapter for the UpdateDetails
        See Also:
